greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: If n <= 1 then n-1 otherwise A107458(n-1) + A107458(n-2).
reference: C. K. Fan, Structure of a Hecke algebra quotient. J. Amer. Math. Soc. 10 (1997), no. 1, 139-167. [Page 156, f^1_n.]
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1).
formula: a(n) = A077961(2-n) for all n in Z.
mathematica: a[ n_] := If[ n < 3, SeriesCoefficient[ 1 / (1 + x^2 - x^3), {x, 0, 2 - n}], SeriesCoefficient[ x^5 / (1 - x - x^3), {x, 0, n}]]; (* _Michael Somos_, Jan 08 2014 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<3, polcoeff( 1 / (1 + x^2 - x^3) + x * O(x^(2-n)), 2-n), polcoeff( x^5 / (1 - x - x^3) + x * O(x^n), n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Jan 08 2014 */
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 08 2008
